column2: A base form skinchanger, repulsive and reclusive.
A Skinchanger that has assumed a generic norse-style appearance and language.
A Skinchanger that has assumed a generic latin-style appearance and language.
This skinchanger has recently changed form and cannot change for sometime.
Change your appearance and mannerisms to that of a Norse person.
Change your appearance and mannerisms to that of a Latin person.
Change your appearance and mannerisms back to your natural skinchanger form.
